body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Laws & Policies     Hawai'i Vocanoes National Park's Purpose                Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park's Purpose          Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park protects, studies, and provides access to KÄ«lauea and Mauna Loa, two of the world's most active volcanoes; and perpetuates endemic Hawaiian ecosystems and the traditional Hawaiian culture connected to these landscapes.
title: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park: Hawai'i Vocanoes National Park's Purpose
